hb.description: Customer service and order manager with distributors via email. Catalog content creator.
bullets: Home Office.
Order issue management.
Catalog content creator.
Communication with customers, distributors, and transport agencies.
Teamwork through the Trello and PrestaShop platforms.
Home Office.
Clear and precise communication with clients.
First appointment record.

dh.description: Design and implementation of a complete web platform and landing page for a temporary rental business.
bullets: Design and implementation of a responsive website.
Design and implementation of an administrative system for complete management.
Implementation of good SEO practices and website performance optimization to increase site visibility.
Automation and optimization of workflow processes, digitalization and organization of reservations, document generation.
Data analysis and visualization through dashboards for decision making.

cec.description: Development of a complete web platform and kitchen system, optimizing order preparation and delivery flow.
bullets: Implementation of a financial module for exact cash control, income/expense tracking and business performance analysis.
Design of a secure architecture with access control by roles for employees, protecting operational and financial information.
Complete digitalization of the order taking and tracking process
Admin panel for stock control, product categories and daily menu configuration.

tbs.description: Development of a complete web platform for travel planning and financial control.
bullets: Complete digitalization of the travel planning process.
Travel management module with tracking of states, passengers, associated services and documentation per file.
Financial tracking that allows visualizing income, expenses and profitability per trip, with support for operations in different currencies.
